name: Vegan Cheese Made Easy
description: Learn to make delicious vegan cheese at home that will amaze your friends and family - from Parmesan to Mozzarella, Cheddar & more.
recipes: Cashew Cheese, Raw Parmesan, Cheddar Cheese Balls, Meltable Almond Mozzarella, Sliceable Smoked Paprika Cheese

name: Authentic Vegan Thai
description: Take a culinary journey to the North of Thailand and experience authentic local Thai recipes in a fully vegan way.
recipes: Pad Thai, Tom Yum, Laab With Tofu, Pad Kra Pao, Massaman Curry

name: Mouthwatering Vegan Desserts
description: Learn to prepare delicious vegan desserts that will brighten up your day - with Julia from Banana Warrior.
recipes: Mixed Berry Cinnamon Roll, Pineapple Cheesecake, Nut Butter Banana Blondies, Salted Caramel Chocolate Bars, Tahini Truffles

name: Authentic Vegan Vietnamese
description: Discover authentic vegan recipes from the north of Vietnam.
recipes: Fresh Spring Rolls, Pho Noodle Soup, Bánh Mì, Fried Tofu With Tomato Sauce, Rice Noodle Salad

name: Vegan North American
description: Discover how to make the American Classics in a fully vegan way - from Burgers and Burritos to Nuggets and Ribs!
recipes: Vegan Burgers, Caesar Salad, Nuggets, French Fries, Sauces & Stocks, Vegan BBQ "Ribs

name: Raw Food Essentials
description: Learn the essentials of raw food and start making delicious and healthy recipes today.
recipes: Raw Italian Pasta, Brownie & Chocolate Ganache, Berry Swirl Cheesecake, Raw Burger, Japanese Nori Sushi Rolls

name: Vegan Japanese - Sushi & Ramen
description: Discover the world of vegan Japanese food and learn to make your own delicious vegan ramen and sushi at home.
recipes: Vegan Gyoza, Dandan Ramen, Shoyu Ramen, Nigiri and Gunkan Sushi, Sushi Cake

name: Vegan Korean
description: Discover the world of vegan Korean food and learn to make your own delicious vegan bibimbap, Korean pancake, bulgogi and more.
recipes: Pajeon, Bulgogi, Gimbap, Bibimbap, Tteokbokki Pasta

name: Raw Food Fundamentals
description: Dive into the fundamentals of preparing healthy and delicious raw food at home. Taught by vegan chef Lauren Lovatt.
recipes: Chocolate Hemp Tart, Seaweed Crackers With Smoked Mushrooms And Cream Cheese, Harvest Bowl

name: Vegan Classic Italian
description: Learn the traditional way of making delicious Italian recipes in a fully vegan way. Taught by experienced chef Alberto.
recipes: Pizza With Vegetables, Pici Pasta With Fake Ragout, Polenta With Mushrooms, Pumpkin Risotto, Eggplant Parmigiana

name: Vegan Swiss Chocolate & Sweets
description: Learn how to prepare delicious high-class vegan chocolate desserts from vanilla clouds to coffee truffles to chocolate cereal bars.
recipes: Chocolate Dessert Cup, Vanilla Chocolate Clouds, Carrot Muffins With Coconut Lime Caramel, Chocolate Cereal Bars, Espresso Truffles

name: Artisanal Vegan Cheese
description: Discover the world of aged and ripened vegan cheese and craft your own rich and flavorsome pieces of vegan cheese at home.
recipes: Cashew Cheese, Almond Cheese, Almond Ricotta, Camembert, Vegan Blue Cheese

name: The Perfect Vegan Brunch
description: Discover a selection of highly delicious vegan breakfast and brunch options for the whole family - with Marika from Plant Base Berlin.
recipes: Tofu Scramble, Savory Pancakes, Golden Milk Porridge, Italian Porridge, Smoked Carrot "Salmon"

name: Healthy & Easy Plant-Based Cooking
description: Learn how to prepare delicious and super healthy whole-food plant based dishes, tips to lose or maintain a healthy weight and much more.
recipes: High Fiber Quinoa Bowl, Sprouted And Fermented Tempeh Sweet Potato Bowl, Tofu Bowl, Pumpkin Lentil Bowl, Chia Pudding

name: Vegan German Classics
description: Learn to prepare classic German recipes - Schnitzel, Rouladen, and more - in a fully vegan way from one of Germany's most distinguished vegan chefs, Johannes Nicolay.
recipes: Schnitzel "Jäger Style" With Fried Potatoes, Roulades With Baked Potatoes, Vegan Steak, Sauerkraut Soup With Gluten-Free Sausages, Sous-Vide Portabella With Mashed Potatoes And Beets

name: Fine Italian Pastries & Desserts
description: Discover an exclusive selection of exquisite Italian pastries and desserts, all completely vegan -  with gourmet pastry chef Matteo Febbraio.
recipes: Pandolce Genovese, Baba Napoletano, Chocolate Shortcrust, Italian Meringue, Cannoli

name: Vegan Pastry Essentials
description: Discover the fundamental principles of vegan baking and start to prepare the most delightful cakes and pastries at home with ease.
recipes: Galette With Strawberry Tonka Filling, Cherry Crumble Cake, Chocolate Babka, Marbled Gugelhupf, Chocolate Raspberry Cake

name: Baking with Sourdough
description: Learn how to bake artisan sourdough bread, authentic Italian pizza, and fluffy focaccia - at home, with ease!
recipes: Sourdough Bread, Sourdough Pizza, Sourdough Focaccia

name: French Pastry Classics
description: Learn how to create some of the world's most famous pastries from a true French pâtissier - 100% vegan and gluten-free.
recipes: Flan Pâtissier, Apple Tart, Baba Au Rhum, Éclair, Paris-Brest

name: Contemporary Italian Cuisine
description: Make the most out of everyday ingredients and explore flavorful Italian recipes with an innovative twist. Taught by Michelin-trained chef Pietro Platania.
recipes: Aperitivo, Risotto, Ribollita, Roasted Vegetable Plate

name: Vegan Pastry Essentials II
description: Discover the world of vegan puff pastries - bake your own delicious croissants, pain au chocolat, and much more. Taught by vegan chef Diana Kronenberg.
recipes: Apfelstrudel & Sweet Potato Strudel, Croissants, Pain Au Chocolat, Baklava, Pastéis De Nata
